code:
%%{init: { 'theme': 'default', 'themeVariables': { 'background': '#ffffff' } }}%%
sequenceDiagram
    participant User
    participant Browser
    participant Frontend
    participant AuthAPI
    participant Redis
    participant WebAuthn
    participant Database
    participant Device

    User->>Browser: Enter email
    User->>Browser: Click Login with Biometric
    
    Browser->>Frontend: Submit form
    Frontend->>AuthAPI: POST /auth/login/options
    
    AuthAPI->>Database: SELECT user
    Database->>AuthAPI: Return user
    
    AuthAPI->>Database: SELECT credentials
    Database->>AuthAPI: Return credentials
    
    AuthAPI->>WebAuthn: Generate auth options
    WebAuthn->>WebAuthn: Create challenge
    
    WebAuthn->>AuthAPI: Return options
    AuthAPI->>Redis: SETEX challenge 300
    Redis->>AuthAPI: OK
    
    AuthAPI->>Frontend: Return options
    
    Frontend->>Browser: navigator.credentials.get()
    Browser->>Device: Request biometric
    Device->>User: Show Touch ID prompt
    
    User->>Device: Authenticate
    Device->>Device: Sign challenge
    
    Device->>Browser: Return assertion
    Browser->>Frontend: Authentication successful
    
    Frontend->>AuthAPI: POST /auth/login/verify
    
    AuthAPI->>Redis: GET challenge
    Redis->>AuthAPI: Return challenge
    
    AuthAPI->>Database: SELECT credential
    Database->>AuthAPI: Return credential
    
    AuthAPI->>WebAuthn: Verify response
    WebAuthn->>WebAuthn: Verify signature
    WebAuthn->>WebAuthn: Verify counter
    
    WebAuthn->>AuthAPI: Verification successful
    
    AuthAPI->>Database: BEGIN TRANSACTION
    
    AuthAPI->>Database: UPDATE credential counter
    Database->>AuthAPI: Updated
    
    AuthAPI->>AuthAPI: Generate tokens
    
    AuthAPI->>Database: INSERT session
    Database->>AuthAPI: Session created
    
    AuthAPI->>Database: COMMIT
    Database->>AuthAPI: Committed
    
    AuthAPI->>Redis: DEL challenge
    
    AuthAPI->>Frontend: Return tokens
    
    Frontend->>Browser: Store tokens
    Browser->>User: Login successful
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
